markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Fangs](/Feats.aspx?ID=5716) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Dhampir" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=750" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 43 <sup>1.1</sup>

</column>

---

Your incisors have grown into true fangs: long, sharp, and well-suited to drawing blood. You gain a fangs unarmed attack that deals 1d6 piercing damage. Your fangs are in the [brawling](/WeaponGroups.aspx?ID=4) group and have the [grapple](/Actions.aspx?ID=2376) and [unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=719) traits.
name: Fangs
